function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Rapid spread of contagious diseases due to physical contact and use of paper-based identity systems.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission and potential for large-scale outbreaks.","Mitigation":"Implementing contactless and paperless identity systems to reduce physical contact and transmission of diseases.","Technologies":"Digital identity systems, biometric authentication, and electronic document verification.","People":"Citizens, residents, visitors, and government and private service providers.","Owner":"Government authorities, service providers, and technology developers."},{"Description":"Inequitable access to digital services and technologies, exacerbating urban inequalities and infrastructure issues.","Impact":"Widening disparities in access to education, healthcare, and remote work opportunities, leading to social and economic inequality.","Mitigation":"Investing in infrastructure for reliable and affordable internet connectivity, providing digital access and devices to underserved communities, and promoting equitable distribution of digital services.","Technologies":"Infrastructure development for internet connectivity, digital access programs, and community outreach initiatives.","People":"Underserved households, schools, and neighborhoods in deprived urban areas.","Owner":"Government agencies, community organizations, and technology providers."},{"Description":"Dependence on traditional behavioral aspects and lack of adoption of contactless technologies leading to continued risk of disease transmission and reduced pandemic containment efforts.","Impact":"Inability to effectively control disease spread, prolonged impact on public health, and persistent disruptions to societal and economic activities.","Mitigation":"Promoting behavioral change towards contactless approaches, incentivizing adoption of new technologies, and implementing policies to enforce contactless interactions.","Technologies":"Contactless payment systems, digital health monitoring tools, and remote access platforms.","People":"General population, businesses, and public institutions.","Owner":"Public health authorities, businesses, and government policymakers."}]}
